--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> Starstomp: I'm not certain about this, but you have a point... This 
> ship IS huge... Let's keep permanent radio contact, though...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Aerotaur::
> >      He nods silently and puts his staff away.  "I think we 
should 
> split up.  This is a big ship and there are only three of us."  He 
> starts heading down the first hallway.
